caption.p: Adolescent wellbeing framework, described by the H6+ Technical Working Group on Adolescent Health and Wellbeing* and adapted to include related climate change effects and interventions at the level of health professionals and the broader community. *The H6+ Technical Working Group on Adolescent Health and Wellbeing includes the Partnership for Maternal, Newborn and Child Health; United Nations Programme on HIV/AIDS; Unesco; UN Population Fund; Unicef, UN Major Group for Children and Youth; UN Women; World Bank; World Food Programme; and World Health Organization
